title: Lincoln Home National Historic Site: Volunteer
body: Volunteer          Support Lincoln Home National Historic Site! As a volunteer you can provide programs for visitors, assist rangers with the protection of park resources, and interact with the public. There is a myriad of rewarding opportunities awaiting you. Share your talents today! Learn more about Lincoln Home's Volunteer Opportunities, including its Trails and Rails program. If you find a volunteer opportunity that you are interested in, please complete and send the Volunteer Application to the park's Volunteer Coordinator Kyle McGrogan at e-mail us. If you have questions about the park's volunteer program contact Volunteer Coordinator Kyle McGrogan at 217-391-3212.
